View Javadoc
1   package nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.external;
2   
3   import static org.mockito.Matchers.anyString;
4   import static org.mockito.Mockito.doReturn;
5   
6   import java.util.UUID;
7   
8   import com.google.common.base.Splitter;
9   import com.google.common.collect.Iterables;
10  import nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.util.UUIDParser;
11  import org.concordion.integration.junit4.ConcordionRunner;
12  import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
13  
14  @RunWith(ConcordionRunner.class)
15  public class CreationFixture extends ResourcesFixture {
16    @Override
17    public void request(String method, String path) {
18  
19      doReturn(UUID.randomUUID()).when(resourceService()).createResource(anyString());
20  
21      super.request(method, path);
22    }
23  
24    public String base() {
25      return baseOf(location());
26    }
27  
28    public String uuidQuality() {
29      String idStr = tailOf(location());
30      return UUIDParser.fromString(idStr).get().map(uuid -> "well-formed UUID").orElse("malformed UUID: " + idStr);
31    }
32  
33    private String baseOf(String s) {
34      return s.substring(0, s.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
35    }
36  
37    private String tailOf(String s) {
38      return Iterables.getLast(Splitter.on('/').split(s));
39    }
40  }
